trans-unit.source: Sets the identity of the user for an ASP.NET application when forms authentication is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 在啟用表單驗證時，設定 ASP.NET 應用程式的使用者識別。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> sets the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object that represents the user identity for the current request when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Forms> in the [authentication Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) element of the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>設定目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件，代表目前的使用者身份識別要求時驗證<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>設<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Forms>中[驗證項目（ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2)應用程式的組態檔元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> exposes an <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event that enables you to provide a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>公開<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>事件，可讓您以提供自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is accessed by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>事件透過指定名為的副程式**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中。

trans-unit.source: In IIS 7.0, using the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> with the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 在 IIS 7.0 中，使用<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>與<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>不支援。

trans-unit.source: For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated modes, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76f9cc78-f978-4837-b1c8-51d642ec4847).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關整合式模式的相容性問題的詳細資訊，請參閱[從 IIS 6.0 的 ASP.NET 應用程式移轉至 IIS 7.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76f9cc78-f978-4837-b1c8-51d642ec4847)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>給自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會呼叫這個建構函式建立的執行個體<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>類別。

trans-unit.source: After calling the constructor, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A> method to initialize the new <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> object.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫之後建構函式，它會呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>方法來初始化新<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>物件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application authenticates the current request.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式驗證目前要求時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>期間引發事件<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>事件<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>類別藉由指定名為的副程式**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs><xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs><xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>屬性提供給**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>給自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>屬性期間**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件、 表單驗證票證之 cookie 或 URL 中所提供的識別使用。

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication mode is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Forms> in the [authentication Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) element of the application's configuration file and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**驗證模式設定為時，才會引發事件<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Forms>中[驗證項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2)的項目應用程式的組態檔和<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>是應用程式使用中的 HTTP 模組。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> object that has a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.Identity%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>至<xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal>物件具有自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.Identity%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources, other than memory, used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" />.
trans-unit.target: 除了記憶體之外，釋放 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" /> 使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A> method ensures that the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is included in the processing of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> and <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>方法可確保<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>隨附於處理<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>和<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>事件。
